column3:
Good Tesla self-driving demo. 

It’s true, buying anything except a Tesla will seem like buying a horse & buggy.

Having seen the evidence unearthed today by Congress, 𝕏 has no choice but to file suit against the perpetrators and collaborators in the advertising boycott racket. 

Hopefully, some states will consider criminal prosecution.

There is a tiny chance this will pass the senate if a few Dems cross party lines, but Biden said he would veto the bill even it did. 

I wonder why? 🤔
Maybe this applies to real-life too 🤔
When ur way underleveled for video game boss fight

Computers will control the future
…
…

They already do

The physicality of the brain becomes startlingly obvious upon inspection: it is a biological computer.

Our brains shrinks over time as we age and when you see the brain of someone with severe dementia, the damage is not subtle. What is surprising is that it functions at all.
The New York Times specializes in tediously misleading propaganda
After the presentation, the @Neuralink team will take questions from 𝕏
